events.title: FOSSASIA 2015
events.description: FOSSASIA 2015 marked the first time the summit was held in Singapore. The conference featured over 100 talks and workshops covering the latest in Free and Open Source Technology projects, including those focused on the development of Singapore as a smart nation. Other topics and activities include: Free and Open Source software, web and mobile development, software for education, map solutions for websites and phones, open knowledge tools, Wikipedia, open data, big data, sensor networks, free wireless networks, graphic design, fashion technology, open source knitting machines and 3D printing. Dr. Vivian Balakrishnan, the Singapore minister in charge of the Smart Nation initiative, also graced the event.

events.title: Ze Wei in Recital
events.description:
Pianist Ng Ze Wei debuts on 16th December 2015!

Catch Ze Wei and his sister, Wen Yan, LIVE at the Esplanade Recital Studio on the 16th of December 2015, Wednesday, 7:30 pm, as he brings you to not only places around the world, but to another dimension of time too!

“Overall, this was an excellently prepared and musically satisfying performance with a real sense of communication and impressive technical control.” - Fali Pavri (Examined Ng Ze Wei in LRSM - Piano Performance)

“Wonderful repertoire. Perfect acoustics. Gorgeous melodies. I must attend this recital” - Ze Wei

events.title: CVIP 2016 : International Conference on Computer Vision & Image Processing
events.description:
CVIP 2016 is an IAPR endorsed conference. Authors are invited to submit unpublished papers, which are not in consideration at any other conference or journal.

Paper Submission:

  • Prospective authors are invited to submit papers of maximum 10 pages length that includes text, figures, tables and references at the paper submission webpage. Instruction for submission, templates for formatting papers will be made available at the submission page.

Proceedings:

  • All accepted papers, whose author(s) register, would be included in the conference proceedings to be published by Springer in their Advances in Intelligent Systems and Computing series.

venue.name: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, Roorkee, Uttarakhand, India

events.title: FOSSASIA 2016
events.description: FOSSASIA is the premier Free and Open Source technology event in Asia for developers, start-ups, and contributors. Projects at FOSSASIA range from open hardware, to design, graphics and software. FOSSASIA was established in 2009. Previous events took place in Cambodia and Vietnam.

events.title: Hack In The North
events.description: This is a student held hackathon for students from all over India. This is India's biggest hackathon.

venue.name: IIIT Road, Jhalwa, Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh, India
